title: Oceanfront Japanese Retreat with Traditional Bedding, Hot Spring & Indoor Pool
description:
Be treated to traditional Japanese hospitality at this waterfront stay in the town of Minabe, located in Japan's Wakayama prefecture. Savour seasonal flavours at Le SENSORIEL, the hotel's onsite buffet restaurant, offering a range of locally sourced dishes inside an elegant dining room. Rejuvenate in the hotel's soothing hot springs at the open-air or indoor baths, melt away under the soothing hands of spa therapists, or enjoy a leisurely swim in the indoor pool. 

Venture into greater Japan with ease from the nearby JR station to explore the Minabe Bairin Plum Grove or travel further to the sacred Kumano Kodo pilgrimage routes.
location_description: Grand Mercure Wakayama Minabe Resort & Spa
offer_address: 348 Omezudomari Oaza Yamauchi, Minabe, Wakayama 645-0012, Japan
